text: Fritz Zwicky (February 14, 1898 â€“ February 8, 1974) was a Swiss astronomer. He created the idea of dark matter.http://spiff.rit.edu/classes/phys440/lectures/gal_clus/gal_clus.html He worked at California Institute of Technology for most of his life. ==References== Category:Swiss astronomers Category:California Institute of Technology faculty Category:1898 births Category:1974 deaths
